text: A Walk with Love and Death is a 1969 American romantic drama movie directed by John Huston (who also stars) and based on the 1961 novel of the same name by Hans Koning. It stars Anjelica Huston, Assi Dayan, Robert Lang, Anthony Higgins, John Hallam, Anthony Nicholls, George Murcell, Michael Gough, Guy Deghy and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1969 romantic drama movies Category:1960s historical movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in the 14th century
title: A Walk with Love and Death
